# Time-Based Business Rules

## Processing Time Constraints

Orders must be processed within 24 hours of submission.
Refunds shall be completed within 5 business days.
Support tickets must receive a response within 2 hours during business hours.

## Session Management

User sessions must expire after 30 minutes of inactivity.
Password reset tokens shall expire after 1 hour.
API tokens must be refreshed every 90 days.

## Data Retention

Logs must be retained for a minimum of 90 days.
User data must be deleted after 7 years of inactivity.
Backup files shall be retained for 30 days.
